titles.title: A resolution designating February 11, 2003, as "National Inventors' Day".
A resolution designating February 11, 2003, as "National Inventors' Day".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee on the Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on the Judiciary. Reported by Senator Hatch without amendment and with a preamble. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 10.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since being reported in the Senate on February 6, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Designates February 11, 2003, as National Inventors' Day.Recognizes the important role of inventors in promoting progress in the useful arts and their invaluable contribution to the welfare of the people of the United States.
